name: DARK TOWER (itch)
description:
This is a horror maze type game.  Find all the collectibles to win, but there are many secrets as well (just try to make it to the top of the tower...)  Um.. there may also be traps, so please make sure to fall into those. Oh and keep a look out for the "World Breaker."   Awesome music too.

Please note: this game is part of something even better than the game alone.  It is a game made to be RIGbox compatible.  What does that mean?  Well the RIGbox is a device that lets you experience the game.  In the game if the wind blows, you will hear it and see it, and the RIGbox will make you feel it as well (actual wind, not rumble)

The sparks that you encounter in 1 of the corridors? The RIGbox will allow you to feel the shock from the sparks (Yes, actual shock).

The beautiful multi-colored lights in the game? Yes, those lights will become the ambient lights in the room when you play the game, and it's all made possible through the RIGbox.   See  www.ReimagineGames.com for details on the release of the RIGbox.  Enjoy!
